summary: A group of spell books are added at the end of the stone bridge leading out of Riverwood. the spell books gives you a spell that transoports followers to you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Gold][size=7]Follower Recall[/size][/color][/center] 
[line]
[center][color=Gold][size=4]by Bwins95[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=Gold][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]2.0
[color=Gold][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]08/13/2012
[color=Gold][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Magic - Spells & enchantments
[line] 
[line] 

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Their are 39 spells that are added by MCM. they will transport a follower to you as long as they are alive and a current follower.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Below are not added

HearthFire
----
RayyaHF
ValdimarHF
GregorHF

Creatures
----
Armored TrollDG
BranDG
CuSithDG 
GarmrDG
Meeko
SceolangDG
Stray Dog
[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
1.0
uplaod
1.1
added missing followers
2.0
added MCM page. 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Upgrade[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Disable a the mod and save. install hte new version.

if you don\'t disalbe and save the toggle state of any spell you have will be opposite of the others.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Known Issues and Bugs[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]If a follower dies they cannot be transported to you. I cannot find any way to fix it.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Incompatibilities[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]This should be compatible with any mod. it doesn\'t modify any follower it uses scripts. if their are any conflicts let me know.[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]PM me on here.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Credits[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]daJbot for hte MCM script[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Unzip and drop the Data folder in the 
Skyrim folder.[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Download and check the box to install.[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Delete the Follower Recall esp and delete any scripts that have \"FR_\".[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Uninstall the mod and delete it from NMM.
[center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] 
[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on th steam network.
[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url] 
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Mod Dependencies[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]SkyUI 3.4[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Before you use the content first contact me and ask for permission[/center] 
[line]
